original_text: A second time I spoke to the angel, ‘What are these two branches of the olive trees? They are next to the gold pipes and oil comes from those pipes.’
korean_text: 다시 그에게 물어 이르되 금 기름을 흘리는 두 금관 옆에 있는 이 감람나무 두 가지는 무슨 뜻이니이까 하니

sentences.original_text: A second time I spoke to the angel
What are these two branches of the olive trees?
sentences.korean_translation: 이 올리브 나무 두 가지는 무엇입니까?

sentences.original_text: They are next to the gold pipes
and oil comes from those pipes
